attributes.action: Should Mp’s be randomly drug tested
attributes.background:
Due to several conservative Mp’s taking part in the leadership debate for prime minister of the UK admitting taking illegal drugs in the past including cocaine & cannabis. 

Should all mp’s be randomly drug tested like serving police officers, members of the UK armed forces & other civil servants.

rejection.details:
We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 
	
You might want to sign this petition:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/264011
